rows.label: qst201008_msg0001
rows.name: Meleph-sama, I'm sorry...

rows.label: qst201008_msg0002
rows.name:
We cut the enemy's numbers in half with
the aid of the Hr√¶svelgr mercs, and we
were able to defeat a Driver...

rows.label: qst201008_msg0003
rows.name:
As a result, we lost most
of the men in our squad and
were forced to retreat.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0004
rows.name:
I knew Mikumari's Driver had
to have been elsewhere...

rows.label: qst201008_msg0005
rows.name:
She must have returned to her Core
Crystal after he was defeated.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm sorry we couldn't
be of more help...

rows.label: qst201008_msg0007
rows.name: No, you are not to blame.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0008
rows.name:
The fault lies with me, for incorrectly
gauging the enemy's strength.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0009
rows.name:
It pains me to say, but I didn't
expect to be contending with
such a dangerous threat.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0010
rows.name:
Hey, no need to be so
down in the dumps.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0011
rows.name:
It's not like the plan
failed completely.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0012
rows.name:
We still got one of them.
Mikumari and her Driver are
out of the picture now.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0013
rows.name:
And we got a good overview of our
opponent's strength and plans. This
seems like a satisfactory result.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0014
rows.name:
But we can't let the rest of
them just get away, can we?

rows.label: qst201008_msg0015
rows.name: Agreed. And I don't intend to.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0016
rows.name:
The longer they remain at large,
the more victims there will be.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0017
rows.name:
Then, we will continue in pursuit
of the perpetrator and try to
gather as much intel as we can.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0018
rows.name:
We'll also make preparations
on our side so that we can
move at the earliest notice.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0019
rows.name: I wish you the best of luck.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0020
rows.name: Ma'am, yes, ma'am!
